comment.author: 16612979@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Consolidated Aircraft, and we'd love to have your photo added to the group.

comment.author: 54447542@N00
comment._content: This was later the boat ramp for Officers stationed at NAS Corpus Christi. The Hangar was a "boat barn".

comment.author: 24445583@N07
comment._content: Growing up during World War II, I was struck by the beautiful lines of the Catalina.  I daydreamed about having my own some day, and flying to romantic islands.  Then I saw one at an airshow, and was surprised at how small it was inside.  Spartan, too, like all military aircraft.  Still a beautiful sight to the eyes, though.

comment.author: 32024533@N04
comment._content:
Great historical photo...thank you for sharing.
Randy
